website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use and very affordable, but you may be disappointed with its effectiveness. It's still a good option if you need minimal repellent action and budget is a concern.
pros: Has the popular features of other models in a low-cost, simple-to-use spray
Can be sprayed directly on plants you want to protect
cons: Not as versatile as some competitors because it's not labeled for pests other than deer
Doesn't prevent deer from eating some types of plants, and the nozzle occasionally clogs

customer_reviews.title: Works on sedum, hydrangeas and mums!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this twice, ordering my third bottle now. We live in Maryland, north of DC, and back to a wooded preserve with a high deer population who are brazen in their approach to eating vegetation. This has saved my hydrangeas, sedum, and even my gorgeous gigantic mums from Costco, all of which had been devoured by the deer until I found this product. I put it on once a month. The smell is strong but not offensive. Based on reviews, the success or failure may be due to regional taste buds of the deer, if there is such a thing?
customer_reviews.author: KSwan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have baby deer who think that hostas, petunias, pansies, etc.. are the best treat ever. Never used this product before. I have made a point to treat my plants after every rain. Really happy to share that I actually have blooms on my plants for longer than 2 weeks now! The scent is not super pleasing but much better than another product we've used. Tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Good Repellent
customer_reviews.text: This repellant helped keep the deer from the hostas they were munching on. The spice scent masks the repellent well as you spray the plants and as you walk by the sprayed plants. Just wear gloves as you apply the spray and avoid getting it on your clothing. Also don’t work too close to the plants within the first day or two after spraying, or you will notice the underlying repellent smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R.

customer_reviews.title: The scent is of spice peppery like mentioned, quite tolerable
customer_reviews.text: The scent is of spice peppery like mentioned, quite tolerable. It did not deter the deer from nibbling on my Echinacea, burning bush, lupines and petunia. The deer here have a different palette... they even got to my marigolds last summer. It's all trial and error. Will not purchase again for my area, but may work for others where the deer are not as brazen to walk up to your front door for their buffet.
customer_reviews.author: LN in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: I live on a dead end road near woods. ...
customer_reviews.text: I live on a dead end road near woods. We have deer who come around, so I was only able to have vegetables and flowers on my deck or inside a fence on the side of the house until my neighbor told me about this spray. I have two large pots of flowers in my front yard now and roses out back. I spray them with this, and the deer don't eat them. Just remember to reapply after it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rollins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good as far as keeping the deer away from certain ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as far as keeping the deer away from certain plants that they devoured last year. The potato vine I have a planter was a deer favorite last year. This year it hasn't been touched. I have some caladiums in pot on my porch that I sprayed just in case the deer wondered onto the porch, I'm not certain yet if this product affected them, but one of my caladium plants wilted substantially. The others have wilted somewhat. None of the other plants have been impacted. So, again it may not be this product but other issues that caused the caladiums to wilt. I've stopped spraying them, so I'll see if they rebound.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: So far, the deer have been deterred, and my poor little nibbled Japanese maple they had developed a fondness for has many leaves again. The other half-eaten small tree has little leaves coming out on the lower branches again and hopefully soon will have leaves all over instead of only above deer height. The stuff does have a scent when first sprayed, but it's not that unpleasant, just a bit sharp. Quickly dries. I'm also impressed with how much is left in my bottle, because I've been spraying some things regularly for several weeks now. My only caveat is that I wouldn't recommend wiping sweat out of the corner of your eye two seconds after you have sprayed something.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but after spraying this on my hibiscus, which were part of the regular salad bar for my resident deer, they are finally growing out with no further attacks from hungry wildlife. Better yet, this stuff stands up pretty well to rain after it dries, so you dont have keep spraying your plants every day during rainy season. The protection endures for a few weeks anyway. The repellant is pricey for what appears to be a simple mixture water, spices and perhaps some aromatic oils. But I cannot complain with the results.
customer_reviews.author: DaytonaDan

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I spent all weekend planting flowers only to wake up to every last one eaten. Someone told me about this and I immediately ordered it. I sprayed it on my plants and as my flowers grew back the hungry creatures stayed away. I learned the hardware you need to spray it weekly for it to work especially if you've had rain. I'd say it works for most critters. A couple weeks when I was lax in my spraying I caught the culprits. It turned out it wasn't the deer at all but a family of bunnies. Dogs on the other hand are attracted to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works. I have proof
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews although I should. But this product worked and I’m happy about it. The smell isn’t that bad but goes away after it dries. For 7 years I’ve had these two trees where deer eat the leaves constantly. I sprayed this product on the leaves 4 days ago and as you can see from the video the deer didn’t want anything to do with the same trees they have devoured for many years.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: This deer repellent works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This deer repellent works great for me. I live in the country in wooded area with lots of deer. I have never had plants/shrubs eaten by deer that have been sprayed with this product - I spray at least every 4 weeks beginning when new growth begins in early spring. The smell is spicy like cinnamon - not really pleasant, but certainly not repugnant like feline urine products. I will continue buying and using this as long as it works. It has not damaged my plants, even in hottest weather.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gramma

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: We had deer that ate all of the leaves off of our garden plants and flowers and needed something to deter them from coming back. We have a dog and needed something safe for her to be around and the reviews on this were good so we decided to give it a try. The smell is noticeable but not bad. I have sprayed the plants twice now and no deer have returned. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M Tweed

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: We planted burning bushes and oakleaf hydrangeas and the deer made our landscaping into a stick scape. This did the trick. It only needs to be applied about once a month, sprays easily and it works perfectly. Watched deer on our outdoor cams walking nearby but walking away without a snip of a leaf. Thank you so much for this product! Now we're flourishing out in our yard and hoping to be showing some beautiful fall foliage in a few months with mature plants.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dudai

customer_reviews.title: DEER DID NOT COME NEAR MY PLANTS!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the deer repellent because it actually kept the deer from eating my flowers and veggies. I probably sprayed everything more than recommended, but I wanted to be very sure my plants survived. I would highly recommend this deer repellent to all gardners.
customer_reviews.author: Rita H. Dingus

customer_reviews.title: No more rose snacking deer
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well. Have not had any deer snacking on my roses since I started using this product. Really has a faint garlic smell. Disappears when it dries. It is not overwhelming at all. Just happy that I finally get to enjoy my roses and not the deer anymore! Will continue to use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SassyGirl

customer_reviews.title: As good as any
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they ALL keep the dear away....for a while. Seems like they all smell awful and work for a while. But need to be re sprayed ever other week or so. So you might as well just get the cheapest one and do it often, no matter what they say. I've tried many, I guess I'd reorder this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle itself is horrible. The price blocked the tube on the first spray and now I can’t get any out. Useless waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love the natural spice scent. Have had trouble with deer eating my hosta plants, day lilies and hydrangea bushes. Not a nimble since we sprayed. I do spray after heavy rains as suggested. We live in the mountains and deer frequent our yard. But now they just go to our salt lick and leave our plants alone.
customer_reviews.author: CAG - NC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps deer away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to keep the deer away. Had mums on the front steps and day after day we had heards of deer eating all the flowers. After one application the deer stayed about 20 feet away and didn't mess with the flowers. And it smells like spicy peppers... No terrible egg smell with this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: It is not rain repellent- new buds have to be sprayed immediately
customer_reviews.text: It does work....no other product that i have used has worked at all. However....i have to spray often because it is not rain repellent. Also you have to make sure you spray every new bud/bloom. I did not spray after the rain each time and i did not get every new bud/bloom and the deer had a good time. My hostas are still hanging in there.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Wow — it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical of this, but needed something to protect my fruit and flowering trees from getting gnawed on every night. I’ve only sprayed 2-3 times, and the trees are doing WAY better — all the branches and leaves have been in tact since I started. I’m shocked. This was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: LadyK

customer_reviews.title: So far so Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have several rose bushes and live in the woods so we have plenty of deer. They love to munch on my blooms and will sometimes take the bush down a foot or more. This does seem to deter the munching. It say it works for 30 days even after it rains, but I spray it on about every 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ausbrooks-Hall

customer_reviews.title: Ordered several bottles as deer are eating my day lily ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several bottles as deer are eating my day lily buds every night. This may work but clumps at nozzle making it impossible to spray. Almost have to just pour on so will not be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth

customer_reviews.title: ... our yard (silly me for not realizing that deers love them). Within a day they were significantly reduced ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought some hostas to plant in our yard (silly me for not realizing that deers love them). Within a day they were significantly reduced in size by our gang of deer in the neighborhood looking to cause mayhem on gardens (I've seen as many as 9 in our yard at one time). We have been spraying this about once a week/every few weeks and have not noticed any new snacking on our plants which have been able to recuperate from the damage. I am definitely very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RAIN F

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on vegetables
customer_reviews.text: While the product description in the Amazon listing says this works on vegetables, the label says it is for ornamental plants ONLY. Quite disappointing. I have purchased a useless bottle of rotten eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Sett Balise

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my Hibiscus which the Deer had literally stripped. They came back beautifully and haven't been touched since. I spray them about every 2 weeks or after a drenching rain. Good value. Scent is not great when you first spray but only lasts a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer plugged within the first few seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Although we shook the bottle according to instructions, the sprayer immediately clogged! It was difficult to clean, but we tried and shortly clogged again. We have no idea whether it repels deer, we can't get the product on our plants!
customer_reviews.author: Hydrologist

customer_reviews.title: Works well, spray nozzle functionality stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked with keeping deer away, but the spray nozzle functionality stopped working. The liquid may be a bit thick or something?
customer_reviews.author: L. Koopal

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two containers of this product to stop Deer from eating my flowers and vegetables. This product does not seem to even phase them. Within hours of apply the spray directly Deer had eaten the sprayed plants as if I had applied a dressing for them. I feel that I deserve a refund but do not know how to pursue that.
customer_reviews.author: jeff catlett

customer_reviews.title: Deer love it!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of repelling the deer, they seem to love it. Have spayed several time over a plumeria and the deer have eaten it almost to the ground. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: rockwoman

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is like dressing on a salad for deer.
customer_reviews.text: Does not deter Deer. My plants are all gone even after spraying this repellent. It's best to just buy plants that are deer resistant than to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works well as I have a wooded yard with many ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as I have a wooded yard with many plantings with deer nearby. However, I spray my plantings much more than instructed--twice a week--but this spray is natural and does not hurt my plants. The spray odor is strong for a few minutes but dies down (to human scent).
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell bad!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st product I've bought that has kept the deer and rabbits away from my roses, hostas, daylillies, etc for over a week and counting! I previously purchased 'liquid fence', a chemical compound designed to imitate coyote urine and deer blood, it only kept the deer away for maybe 2 weeks, even with multiple sprays and it smelled horrible. This product smells like spicy cinnamon and isn't overpowering at all. I spray when I see new growth and I haven't had any problems with deer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Did nor work
customer_reviews.text: This one did not work, the deer came and ate all the roses.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Shen

customer_reviews.title: Marginally Effective
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed regularly, after rain, etc. Deer mostly ignored it and ate my flowering plants at will. I'm not sure which deer it was, so I'll just call her "Jane Doe'.
customer_reviews.author: heysox

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. The deer have stopped eating my rose bushes and other plants. The smell is pleasant, and it is extremely easy to use. I watch my rose bushes bloom while the deer feast on my neighbors' bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I have herds of deer roaming around eating everything. But I started using this in my flower garden, and they have stopped eating my plants and flowers completely. I honestly didn't even think it would work, but it really does! I spray it on my flowers and plants more frequently than the directions say to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Will add my testimonial here- this stuff really works. We are a wooded lot right at the edge of a city with a massive deer problem. They would eat EVERYTHING in our beds in the spring/summer. They loved hostas. This has really kept things under control for the past couple of seasons. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckie G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: We have about 16 hosta plants along our front walkway. Every year, the deer have a one night party and eat them down to the stubs.I sprayed the hosta for the first time in May, 30 days later in June, and so far, not a nibble. October-Perfect! Sprayed once a month & we got thru the whole summer without a bite! Next year, started spraying monthly in May, it's now Aug 3rd & not a bite in almost two full summers!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Does help to deter deer
customer_reviews.text: Our deer don't know what "deer-resistant" plants are and can't resist eating just about everything in our yard! This product does help to deter them, but it's not 100% effective. It also needs to be reapplied frequently, especially after heavy rains. However, it is one of the best products I've used, so I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Ann Simmons

customer_reviews.title: It  worked
customer_reviews.text: As a suburbanite I didn't realize how much damage deer can do, now I know and am glad this deer repellent actually does what it says. My roses are all in full bud again.
customer_reviews.author: knitnweed

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It Works!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time ever I actually have impatiens growing in August that the deer haven't eaten. This stuff is great! I wish I had used it earlier on my hostas. Smell is pungent but not unpleasant - and it's better than other substances I've tried. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had a deer eating a pear tree I just planted. It worked! Also sprayed some green pepper plants
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh it’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: Of course it’s stinky! It’s a natural deer repellent! It works amazingly well. Spray it on 1-2x/week, particularly after a heavy rain. We have a big field behind our house with a continuous flow of deer; they stay out of our yard and away from my tomato plants, carrots, zinnias, beans, basil, etc because I spray both the garden and the perimeter of my lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bach

customer_reviews.title: Effective tool to protect plants
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work, but it kept the voracious local rabbit and deer population from scalping some trees and flowers that I could not otherwise get to grow. Highly recommended! They do as well as they can with the scent, but it still doesn't smell great due to the egg ingredients, so be careful how the wind is blowing when you spray.
customer_reviews.author: radikuhl

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. The last two year dear have eaten our flowers. This year the were not touched. It smells like hot sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Bgard

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever, it does completely the opposite of what it claims. I sprayed it on the plants that the deer would feast on at night and the following morning all the plants were completely gone. It attracted them instead of repelling. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: al3x

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: It smells a little spicy--not bad--to me, but the deer have left my flowers alone since I started using it. You do need to remember to re-apply it after a rain.
customer_reviews.author: carol author

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: was looking for a way to keep my small garden safe from deer this stuff work great so far now the deer go over to my neighbors garden lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a lot of deer repellents with varied success. This product seems to really work.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works great for both deer and rabbits
customer_reviews.text: A natural product that works well to stop rabbits and deer from eating your plants.
customer_reviews.author: melee3

customer_reviews.title: "It works,get the concentrate and save money"
customer_reviews.text: It worked for me on my trees,bushes and tomatoes to deer from eating them to a stem. Get the concentrate and save money. This spray bottle doesn't go too far and you need to re-apply after rains to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Deer repellent
customer_reviews.text: Works fair. For the price I would expect better performance
customer_reviews.author: Jim warren

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The leaves on my young trees have not been eaten off since I started using the product. I spray it on over couple weeks. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Deer repellent
customer_reviews.text: I like because it works. I have deer that come on my patio to eat my flowers but they won’t eat anything with this on it. The other good thing is it works even after it rains. I would suggest getting a sprayer from Walmart and putting it in it.
customer_reviews.author: OUTDOORLOVER

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how well this stuff works! Easy to apply, doesn’t have an offensive odor and keeps the deer away from my garden.
customer_reviews.author: LadyRed

customer_reviews.title: Worked 1/2 time
customer_reviews.text: Only worked when I apples every day. If it rained, it needed sprayed on again. Deer ate my lilies anyway. You decide whether it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Ann McPhail

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that seems to keep the deer away- for now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed on my eaten grasses that I witnessed dear eating on my camera. Since then, they are growing and not being eaten. Sprayed my Fig Tree, will try and update later after figs are in to see if they weren't eaten too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to work. I spray every night all around and on the plants and flowers and dogwood tree. I live in north jersey and deer love to eat everything. I’ve used the container on concentrate already. Deer ate a lot first night I planted, sprayed this ever since and so far no additional plants have been eaten.
customer_reviews.author: AHGisme

customer_reviews.title: Good Spray for Shrubs
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Odor is not too unpleasant .
customer_reviews.author: janet s

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to keep deer away
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works to keep deer away from our plants. The spice scent is the least offensive of any. I spray every 3-4 weeks and our local herd stays away, while our neighbors complain about the damage from their foraging.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Hurts plants
customer_reviews.text: Made the plants wither.... Seems too strong for tomato plant leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Zeff Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Every morning I would see deer feasting on my newly planted Grandiflora..I considered a crossbow but started using this product instead. I have sprayed it every morning and again at night on rainy days. I've been using it for a week now and So far so good and no deer. ..pleasant smell too.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and with repeated applications after heavy rains the deer have left my hostas and camellias alone after destroying them last year.
customer_reviews.author: JEK

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: I liked he odor of the product. As I have only used it as of tonight I cannot make an accurate review of the product's successfulness of keeping the deer from eating my flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Janis M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, I liked it so much bought my sister a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, the deer completely stripped my new fig trees. I lost one of them completely & sprayed the repellent on the remaining one & it's doing great this year.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell, but deer don’t
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be working well — we have ravenous deer. I really like the spice scent! I do apply more like every three weeks rather than 4.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wade

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, If You Can Get It Out of the Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product successfully for a number of years. Unfortunately, company has changed to a different sprayer bottle design. The new sprayer clogs after using half a bottle. This has happened on multiple bottles I've purchased recently.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant aroma
customer_reviews.text: I like the non offensive smell and easy to mix/use and the deer stay away.
customer_reviews.author: comfortfoot

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Better smell then many of the other deer repellents I’ve tried. Keeps them away but you do have to respect every week or after rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Deers Away
customer_reviews.text: It works. The deer haven't touched my deer resistant hostas. Should be reapplied every other month or more often after heavy rain season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stinky and still didn't stop the deer.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this works for other people's deer, but the deer that live at my house didn't care. The plants all still stink, but they are also mostly eaten.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: there is no spray that works better than this
customer_reviews.text: If you really want to keep deer from eating your plants, bushes, or whatever, there is no spray that works better than this. The deer can't stand it. If it rains, however, you need to spray again.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff...first year I have had hostas blooming and not nibbled to the ground.
customer_reviews.text: ...first year I have had hostas blooming and not nibbled to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: C. Courbois

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use in this spray bottle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use in this spray bottle. The deer avoid the plants when it's used regularly. Must apply after every rain or deer will return.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: The stuff worls. I did douse the garden with it. I must have used half the bottle it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Nance

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Deer like to eat the buds off of my lollies as soon as they appear on the plants. The buds are out and nothing has eaten them so l would say this product works!
customer_reviews.author: Roger P.

customer_reviews.title: Working well and doesn't have a horrible sent like some products
customer_reviews.text: This has stopped the deer but you do need to read the instructions and apply 2 coats for it to be effective. Has a spice smell to me, not a nasty smell like some sprays.
customer_reviews.author: L. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s work. Have to be vigilant and spray after it rains.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Leaked out mess
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered, the product had totally leaked out and the box was saturated. This has been replaced but now I’m trying to figure out how to return the mess that got delivered the first time. Hasn’t been long enough yet to see if it works
customer_reviews.author: sarah b.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Deer have not bunched on my hostas at all though I’ve seen footprints. There is a slight odor but it’s usually gone the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I sprayed this on my flowers weeks ago and Iwatch the animals in our very "busy" backyard walk right ...
customer_reviews.text: Last year, my flowers didn't last a week without this product. I sprayed this on my flowers weeks ago and I watch the animals in our very "busy" backyard walk right by the very same plants they devoured last year! LOVE this product and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deer repellent
customer_reviews.text: My hostas never looked so good! I live surrounded by deers and a little spritz every so often and not even a nibble!
customer_reviews.author: Cal M

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: So farnit has worked perfectly butbrqinnafter it seemntonhave washed away. No stink no smell. Brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Dev Gil

customer_reviews.title: Deer repellant
customer_reviews.text: Good smell. Didn’t think it lasted very long or the deer started to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It did keep the deer away. However only 4 stars because of the lingering odor.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z

customer_reviews.title: This did not deter the deer from my plants whatsoever ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not deter the deer from my plants whatsoever. In fact, it was as though I had added a delightful seasoning for them.
customer_reviews.author: HDubz

customer_reviews.title: This is my second bottle. I have the most ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. I have the most gorgeous roses because of it. No more deer munching on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed bushes, Deer is enjoying less time at that location, however, still enjoying some snacking.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pittillo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it often
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but must apply every 3 weeks. Rain doesn't seem to effect it.
customer_reviews.author: silvercrayon

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Great. I just need to be on top of spraying - like after a hard rain.
customer_reviews.author: BarDevlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been spraying this product on my plants every two weeks for the last two or three months now and it has worked as advertised. Waiting to see how effective it is once the dry season kicks in. But so far so good.

customer_reviews.text: Works great. Deers not eating my wife's flowers any more!

customer_reviews.title: This really works
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a house in the Pocono mountains and deer ate all my hosta. I sprayed the nubs with this and they all came back. I spray it about every 2 weeks when I'm up there, and they're doing very well! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.text: Works great. Keeps the deer from eating all my flowers.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible! I think I have had more deer eat my flowers than before I started using this. I tried it because Bobbex smells, but nothing touched my flowers when I was using it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ciaccio

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well so far. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well so far. I have been alternating it with Liquid fence. So far I still have all my flowers and I have a family of deer living in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: ShyLaurel

product_meta.title: I Must Garden Deer Repellent: Spice Scent Deer Spray for Gardens & Plants – Natural Ingredients – 32oz Ready to Use
feature_bullets: TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS – For over 15 years, I Must Garden has been the preferred brand of professional gardeners for use in public gardens and resorts. Trusted for its reliability, durability, and pleasant spice scent.

NATURALLY STRONGER – Combines natural ingredients that make plants inedible to deer AND powerful botanical oils that are highly irritating to their sense of smell. Contains triple the number of active ingredients than other repellents for ultimate plant protection

SAFE FOR PLANTS – Safe to spray directly on any plants that are being damaged by deer. Perfect for protecting Perennials (hostas, daylilies, roses, tulips, oriental lilies), Annuals (pansies, impatiens), Shrubs (roses, azaleas, rhododendron, hawthorn), and Vegetables

FORMULATED TO LAST LONGER – Contains strong natural sticking agents that make the repellent adhere to the leaves of your plant. Provides long-lasting protection – does not need to be re-applied after average rainfall

SAFE FOR PETS & POLLINATORS – Made from natural ingredients and botanical oils that are safe for pets, people, and the environment. Contains NO harmful chemicals or glues that threaten nearby wildlife
